$AMAT $BAC $GE $MSFT We have the highest inflation, housing crises, sky rocketing gas prices and an economy spiraling down the toilet. Now we are sending 2 billion per month to Ukraine? This incompetent president is more concerned about Ukraine than America. If he had spent the fraction of time he spent on Ukraine and Putin on our economy, we wouldn't be where we are now. Instead, he is deflecting his incompetency to "Putin's price hike". And all these tax payer's money is being given to one of the most corrupt governments in the world with no accountability. Yet, we are struggling to get funding for COVID relief, or border protection. Am asking myself.....does Ukraine has something on Biden? B/c this is beginning to look a lot like extortion.
